participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and active, Emma enjoys fitness and helping others. She is friendly and has a straightforward approach to conversations.
participant_1.background: Two dogs live with me. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. Eating is something I do when I'm bored. I have short hair. I go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Energetic and sociable, Liam enjoys being around people and has a playful side. He has a strong interest in helping his community.
participant_2.background: I'm a party animal. I help out at the food bank occasionally. I am deathly afraid of heights. My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I own a cat and a dog.

content.text: I am doing well. how are they? I just got back from the gym
I am just waking up, I overslept. How was the gym?
the gym is the best. do you have any pets? I have two dogs
I have a cat and a dog. What breed are your dogs?
I do not have any dogs. do you like to go to gym?
I like to watch the rowing machine. what do you do for a living?
I work in a restaurant. I also help out at the food bank. What do you do for a living?
I work at a gym. what about you? do you work? I do
that sounds like a lot of fun. what is your favorite food?
I like italian food, what about you?
I like eating italian food. do you go to school? I am bored
No I graduated last year. Do you like school?
yes, I do. I am a school student. do you?
I study a lot. do you have
